ComicInfo.Penciller: I.N.J. Culbard,Jim McCarthy,Leigh Gallagher,Patrick Goddard,Rufus Dayglo
ComicInfo.Summary:
This week’s zarjaz line-up in the Galaxy’s Greatest includes: Judge Dredd: The Beating by John Wagner, Patrick Goddard, Adam Brown, and Annie Parkhouse; Defoe: The London Hanged by Pat Mills, Leigh Gallagher, and Annie Parkhouse; Brass Sun: Motor Head by Ian Edginton, INJ Culbard, and Ellie De Ville; Bad Company: First Casualties by Peter Milligan, Rufus Dayglo, Jim McCarthy, and Simon Bowland.
Cover: Leigh Gallagher
Judge Dredd - The Beating (Part 2) (John Wagner - Patrick Goddard)Bad Company - First Casualties (Part 10) (Peter Milligan - Rufus Dayglo and Jim McCarthy)Brass Sun (Book Four) - Motor Head (Part 10) (Ian Edginton - INJ Culbard)Defoe - The London Hanged (Part 10) (Pat Mills - Leigh Gallagher)Tharg's Terror Tales - The Crow Gifts (Part 2) (David Baillie - Josh George)
ComicInfo.Title: Prog 1959
